com.taursys.tools
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.taursys.tools.Settings
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProjectSettings, UserSettings
public abstract class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

Settings is a class which contains, stores and retrieves properties

Version:
1.0
Author:
Marty Phelan
